about_the_game:
SUMMARY

Paranox is a singleplayer survival horror game. As a Paranormal Researcher you find yourself taking an abandoned school as your research project, hoping to uncover the secrets that lay within the shadows. As you explore the haunted school you will find that you are not alone, your goal is to explore the school's twisted labyrinths in search for clues that will maybe lead you to the answers you seek... You must survive at all costs. BEWARE, as your presence within the walls of the school has caused an emergence of terrifying creatures...

GAMEPLAY

In Paranox you will have to traverse the school's labyrinth and avoid the creatures that stand in your path. Beware, as each creature has their own way to sniff you out so you should use your environment, spatial awareness and strategy in order to complete your research and survive. Your research consists of collecting a set amount of clues, which will uncover the secrets that have been buried within its crumbling walls.
No two games will play out the same way, no area is safe.
The more you know, the more relentless the creatures become, craving to snuff out your sanity's flame.
You can traverse vents and hide in lockers. Use the twisted labyrinth rooms and long, dark corridors with caution.

OBJECTIVE

Collect notes to reveal specific items which will have to be picked up. You will need to pick up 10 notes, and 10 items corresponding to each of those notes. When you pick up a note, X marks the spot on your map where you will find the item that you need to pick up. Once a note is picked up, all other notes disappear until you have picked up the item which corresponds to that note. Be careful as the creatures will do everything in their power to stop you.
Will you dare to keep seeking the truth?

KEY FEATURES

  • Replayability
    Notes, Items and Creatures spawn in different locations. Creatures path in unique ways. There will always be something new to discover when replaying the game.
  • 3 Difficulty Levels
    There are 3 difficulty levels you can choose from: Casual, Normal and Impossible.
  • AI Pathing
    Some creatures path as they wish, others work together and some are always on your tail
  • Speedrun
    We have an inbuilt Speedrun Timer and we encourage everyone to try and speedrun the game on each difficulty level and share their runs!
  • Female Protagonist
    As the leading female paranormal researcher you get to experience the world of terror from her perspective
  • More Features to Come!
    As we get through Early Access phase we will release more features to enhance the game experience

Paranox uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2023, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

short_description: Paranox is a singleplayer horror game. Dive into darkness as a daring paranormal researcher, unraveling the ominous mysteries of a forsaken school. In its haunting corridors, you're not just a spectator—evil lurks in the shadows, stalking your every move. Will you survive the terror?
